item.title: King Legacy Map Guide
item.description:
King Legacy is one of the RPGs based on One Piece . And like in the original anime, players can explore various islands in the three seas. On them, you will complete quests and, of course, fight enemies. And to make it easier for you to find the islands you need, use this King Legacy map guide.

The islands differ not only in appearance but also in level. If you sail to a location significantly higher than yours, you will not be able to complete quests there. In addition, enemies will most likely one-shot you.

King Legacy's Map, Explained

All new players start their journey on Starter Island . There, you can complete the first quests, as well as purchase weapons or fruits to start creating a build. But, as soon as you reach level 50 or higher, you will need to sail to another island with stronger enemies and, accordingly, greater rewards.

However, the map in King Legacy only displays the places you have visited , which is why it is quite difficult to find the necessary islands at first. Additionally, each of the three seas has its own unique map in this Roblox game. The sections below will detail all the seas and islands in them.

First Sea Map in King Legacy

item.title: Genshin Impact Player Pulls Off Incredible Achievement While Playing on a Watch
item.description:
One highly skilled Genshin Impact player has managed to get a perfect score on the latest version of the Spiral Abyss Floor 12 while playing the game on what appears to be an Apple Watch. While the feat adds to the ever-growing list of impressive Genshin Impact community achievements, there is some debate over the exact device used to accomplish this, which looks like an Apple Watch but could actually be something else.

Genshin Impact 's Spiral Abyss challenge domain changes on a regular basis. The last three floors (9–12), called the Abyssal Moon Spire, are reset once per month, with each new reset bringing new enemies, Ley Line Disorders, and blessings. Rewards scale by area, and obtaining perfect three-star ratings on the top floors tends to be a worthwhile endeavor. Genshin Impact 's Spiral Abyss is overall widely considered as one of the game's toughest challenges.

While some players get stuck once they reach the higher floors, others are looking for ways to up the challenge even further through self-imposed limitations. One such fan has recently posted a video of them clearing the top three floors of what's supposedly the upcoming 5.8 version of Genshin Impact 's Spiral Abyss with a perfect three-star rating on an Apple Watch. The video, posted on Chinese social media platform BiliBili (via Dexerto) by user Hua Qiao Chen Ye Yu Cang, shows them blasting through the final floor of the Abyss, seemingly unbothered by the constraints of a 1.92-inch screen.

Genshin Impact 5.8 Spiral Abyss on (What Looks Like) Apple Watch Ultra

The device that the player used to achieve this impressive feat looks like either the 2022 Apple Watch Ultra or its 2023 follow-up, the highly rated Apple Watch Ultra 2. While there are no obvious visual cues to distinguish between the two, it's possible that the smartwatch in the video isn't an Apple product at all. Genshin Impact is not officially available on wearables, and watchOS is a locked platform, making it impossible to run HoYoverse’s gacha ARPG on such devices through legitimate means.

This leaves two possibilities: the player used a jailbroken Apple Watch Ultra (2) or a knockoff device running Google’s Wear OS, formerly known as Android Wear. The latter seems more likely, as running Android apps on unsupported hardware is generally easier than doing the same with their iOS counterparts within Apple’s ecosystem.

No, Genshin Impact 5.8 Update Isn't Out Yet

Another mystery surrounding this achievement is how exactly the player got their hands on the Genshin Impact 5.8 update. The upcoming patch is scheduled for global release on July 30, and HoYoverse generally doesn't do early releases for its home market. Regardless, clearing the 12th floor of the Spiral Abyss on a smartwatch has impressed many fans, as evidenced by the BiliBili video garnering over 570,000 views, 40,000 likes, and more than 7,000 shares since its July 21 debut.

6 Images
6 Images

item.title: Roblox: Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs List (July 2025)
item.description:
Combat Warriors is similar to many other Roblox shooters, but it is especially addictive and fun because of its fast pace. In fact, someone dies here almost every second, so the developers decided to add kill sounds to diversify the gameplay. Roblox players interested in a complete list of Combat Warriors kill sound IDs can find it below.

Updated July 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh batch of kill sound IDs has just been added to the list, bringing in new effects like explosions and classic sounds. These can be a fun way to change up your in-game experience, whether you're aiming for humor, intensity, or just something unexpected. With over a hundred options available, there’s plenty to choose from to make your eliminations stand out. More IDs may be added later, so it’s worth checking back for future updates.

All Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs (Combat Warriors Codes)

Combat Warriors has recently gained wide popularity, and players have fallen in love with this game because of its action and drive. The developers are eager to support this project and add various maps and new features, including more Kill Sound IDs. This article is constantly updated to provide players with all the latest information. Below, fans can find a list of Kill Sound IDs:

How to Redeem Kill Shound IDs in Combat Warriors

Redemption of Kill Sound IDs in Combat Warriors is a very simple task. However, if players are still having problems, this step-by-step guide should help to solve them. They should keep in mind though that to unlock the ability to redeem a Kill Sound ID, players will need to pay 199 Robux.

  • Open Roblox and launch Combat Warriors.
  • In the main menu of the game, find the settings.
  • Click on it.
  • Go to the "Audio" tab.
  • Enter the above IDs in the "Kill Sound ID" field.

Combat Warriors Tips and Tricks

To begin with, players need to learn how to move correctly, slide, dash, stomp, and so on, which will lead to success. The next step is to master the combat mechanics. It's not that difficult. Players just need to hit the enemy at the right moment. Completing daily quests is also a key to success, as these quests offer in-game currency with which players can buy new weapons.

Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Combat Warriors

One of the best things about Roblox is the huge variety of games on offer. This bodes well for those who are starting to get bored of their favorite Roblox games, as there are usually plenty of great alternatives just waiting to be discovered. Below, players can learn about the five best Roblox games like Combat Warriors :

  • Project Slayers
  • A One Piece Game
  • Arsenal
  • Dragon Blox
  • Base Battles

About the Combat Warriors Developers

The developers of Combat Warriors never released any other games. But, their group in Roblox already has more than 900K members, and this only indicates the good quality of the project and the hard work of the developers.

item.title: Roblox: Gubby Tower Defense Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Gubby Tower Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Gubby Tower Defense
  • How to Get More Gubby Tower Defense Codes

Gubby Tower Defense is a wonderful and well-made strategy game in which you need to collect Gubbies and defend the world from enemies. For each victory over waves of enemies, you will receive Gubcoins with which you can expand your army and overcome more difficult challenges.

To make the gameplay even easier and more diverse, you can redeem Gubby Tower Defense codes that will bring you both Gubcoins and help you level up faster. As in other Roblox games, the process of getting rewards is not complicated; however, just in case, we have prepared a guide on how to do it, which you can find right below the list of codes.

Updated July 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Gubby Tower Defense keeps things fresh with limited-time perks that grant bonus Gubcoins and XP. These extras are great for leveling up faster or snagging upgrades, so it’s worth checking in often to see what’s been added.

All Gubby Tower Defense Codes

Working Gubby Tower Defense Codes

  • Matchmaking - Redeem this code to get 200 Gubcoins and XP. (NEW)
  • Modifiers - Redeem this code to get 750 Gubcoins and XP. (NEW)

Expired Gubby Tower Defense Codes

  • Summer - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • QuestCompensation - Redeem this code to get 100 Gubcoins.
  • 1MVisits - Redeem this code to get 1 Level.
  • SupportTowers - Redeem this code to get 200 Gubcoins.
  • HardMode - Redeem this code to get 200 Gubcoins and 20 EXP.
  • 200Active - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

If you are left with no resources, or even more so if you are a beginner, be sure to redeem Gubby Tower Defense codes. It won't take you much time, and it will bring generous rewards that will greatly speed up the development process in this Roblox game.

How to Redeem Codes for Gubby Tower Defense

Redeeming Gubby Tower Defense codes is not a difficult process, especially if you already understand this Roblox game's UI. If you can't find the redemption option, use our guide, which describes how to proceed step by step:

  • Launch Gubby Tower Defense .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in two columns. Among them, interact with the last one in the first column, which says Other.
  • This will open the menu that contains the redemption section. The redemption section contains an input field and a green Submit Code button next to it. Next, enter one of the working codes in the input field.
  • Lastly, click the green Submit Code button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will not see any notification, but the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Gubby Tower Defense Codes

Be sure to check out the game's official social media pages if you're going to manually find more Roblox codes. These are the primary sources, and it is likely that you will find all the codes that have ever been published.

  • Official Gubby Tower Defense Roblox group.
  • Official Gubby Tower Defense Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Flashpoint Worlds Collide Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Flashpoint Worlds Collide is a Roblox game in which you will fight crime using the superpowers of one of the best DC superheroes, the Flash. The gameplay takes place in a big city, and although it is quite empty, there are always some points of interest in it. Sometimes, you'll need to neutralize thieves, and sometimes you'll be able to take part in a race with other players. Even moving between these events is a lot of fun because you have supersonic speed.

In the game, you can buy new costumes and exchange money for extra speed. The good news is that you don't have to spend Robux because you can redeem Flashpoint Worlds Collide codes and get some free rewards.

Updated July 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Flashpoint Worlds Collide has released a brand-new code for players, adding even more rewards to stack up your in-game arsenal. Whether you're grinding for EXP, stacking cash, or unlocking exclusive suits, this update gives you a solid boost. Don’t skip this one - it’s a great chance to level up fast and get some freebies.

All Flashpoint Worlds Collide Codes

Working Flashpoint Worlds Collide Codes

  • thankyoufor900klikes!! - Enter this code to get 60000 Cash, 60000 EXP, and 1 V-X. (NEW)
  • ClicksterYT - Enter this code to get Clickster Suit.
  • MartyZealousTooQuick - Enter this code to get Marty Zealous Suit.
  • jldownfall - Enter this code to get Suicide Squad Kill the Justice League Flash.
  • N3G4T1V3 - Enter this code to get Negative Flash.
  • Velocity9 - Enter this code to get 1x Velocity 9.

Expired Flashpoint Worlds Collide Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Flashpoint Worlds Collide

In most Roblox games, you can easily redeem codes even if you enter the game for the first time. It is important for the authors not to confuse players, so they implement this function in the same way as in other titles. Therefore, experienced players quickly understand how to redeem codes in any game they enter. In Flashpoint Worlds Collide , this option is placed directly in the game interface, so even beginners will figure out what's what. However, if you still need a hint, you can simply use our guide below.

  • Open Roblox and launch Flashpoint Worlds Collide .
  • Pay attention to the block of ten buttons on the left side of the screen. Click the purple Codes button.
  • In the white box, paste a code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

Remember that codes can quickly expire, so redeem them as soon as possible to get all the rewards.

How to Get More Flashpoint Worlds Collide Codes

Sometimes, players spend a lot of time searching for Roblox codes, and they can also be inactive. Fortunately, we regularly add and check codes in our guides so that you find the most up-to-date information here. Still, it also makes sense to visit the official web resources of the Flashpoint Worlds Collide developers:

  • Flashpoint Worlds Collide X page
  • Flashpoint Worlds Collide Discord server
  • Flashpoint Worlds Collide Roblox group
